configuration:
# Console appender
# Pattern of log message for console appender %d{dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss.SSS} %magenta([%thread]) %highlight(%-5level) %logger{200}.%M - %msg%n
# File appender
logback/application.log false
# Pattern of log message for file appender %d{yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss} %-5p %m%n
# File appender
logback/request.log false
# Pattern of log message for file appender %d{dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss.SSS} %thread %highlight(%-5level) %logger{200}.%M - %msg%n
# File appender
logback/hibernate.log false
# Pattern of log message for file appender %d{dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss.SSS} %thread %highlight(%-5level) %logger{200}.%M - %msg%n
